org.jpedal.examples.viewer

Class MultiViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.Viewer
      • org.jpedal.examples.viewer.MultiViewer

  • public class MultiViewer
extends Viewer
    enhance Viewer with ability to include multiple windows for opening more than 1 PDF Run directly from jar with java -cp jpedal.jar org/jpedal/examples/viewer/MultiViewer See also Viewer example http://files.idrsolutions.com/samplecode/org/jpedal/examples/viewer/Viewer.java.html

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      MultiViewer()
      setup and run client
      MultiViewer(int modeOfOperation)
      setup and run client passing in paramter to show if running as applet, webstart or JSP (only applet has any effect at present)
